name: Vectors (itch) (brunosantos)
description:
This is a free demo of a puzzle game where you use Vectors to overcome obstacles and reach the finish line. Control your actions in order to reach the goal!

Features:
  • Overcome 30+ levels in this amusing game.
  • Enjoy the relaxing music.
  • Collect all stars in each level.

PLAY  THE FULL VERSION!
